name: Cooking Day - Top Restaurant Game
description:
🍜 🍟It’s time for tap to Cook DELICIOUS and YUMMY famous dishes from all over the world in this new highly addictive time management game COOKING DAY- RESTAURANT CRAZE, TOP CHEF GAMES 🌯🍗

Fulfill your own restaurant chef games desire and create your own cooking dairy at fast food games with this super crazy restaurant 2019. CRAZY CHEF! Grab the amazing opportunity of becoming an crazy chef in town by playing COOKING DAY- TOP RESTAURANT GAMES and cook some delicious holiday recipes of chef games. Show your special cooking skills with food diary and amaze the customers with your latest food dishes of Restaurant Kitchen Games. TAP COOKING CHALLENGE of fast food games with the fast pace serving with joy of cooking at food management games of crazy kitchen in spicy games. Customers are hungry and waiting for food, gather your equipment’s and give people the experience of fine dining with your special crazy cooking skills and joy of cooking in new dash Restaurant madness free Cooking games at diner dash.🍩🍪.


RESTAURANT COOKING GAMES 2019 is here with diner dash. Enter amazing world of food street cooking of our new COOKING DAY- RESTAURANT CRAZE, TOP CHEF GAMES where your task is to serve customers with best dishes 🍽️ on time in Restaurant Kitchen Games in this holiday season to complete your cooking dairy hot games fiesta. Show everyone in kitchen who is the MASTER OF RESTAURANT COOKING GAMES. This urban food game is filled with challenging levels and amazing game play with different worlds where you can cook best meals & cuisines and TRY NEW FOOD RESTAURANT of food fever games. Tap as fast as you can for cook and serve fast food chef meals at restaurant simulation of kitchen craze fever in kitchen games.  

💫✨The fast food cooking simulation games for girls is loaded with amazing challenges of 2019 restaurant games and fast pace time management fast food games. Tap to Cook & serve hungry customers in many FANCY RESTAURANT spicy cooking games! Get ready to become the best cooking crazy chef in every kitchen that this game has to offer! Give yourself real kitchen cooking challenge of crazy kitchen cooking games in diner dash. This super crazy game has gathered all the famous dishes and kitchen fever recipes of AMERICA, THAI, INDIA, EUROPE & DUBAI to enjoy the kitchen craze fast food time filled with madness cooking and restaurant games. Take orders of customers and quickly start making best dishes and do fast cooking in given time ⏱️🎉. 

TOP DISHES IN YOUR CRAZY CHEF RESTAURANT SPICY GAMES

🍖 Steaks
🍣 Fish n Chips
🍲 Continental Food
🍔 Burgers
🍕 Pizza
🍰 Deserts
🍹 Shakes & Drinks

👩🍳👨🍳You’ll be feeling like a dashing cafe manager in restaurant cooking games & crazy kitchen! Not to mention the special cooking crazy kitchenware that makes you the crazy chef of street food games. Let’s enjoy the worldwide theme and music with best from all over the world. Park your food truck around the corner and start serving STREET FOOD to fancy customers with cooking crazy games. Get ready & enter the restaurant simulation world of kitchen games! The cafe is all yours now in this super crazy games of food fever 2019! 🍣🌮

Features of Top Chef Kitchen Restaurant free Cooking Games

🍽️ Exciting Cooking games with many restaurants of fast food games
🍽️ Best Food serving & Restaurant serving games 2019
🍽️ Many Challenging levels to play of Hot games
🍽️ Earn Keys to unlock new amazing cooking world and kitchen cabinets
🍽️ Utilize coins to upgrade your kitchen items in fast food games
🍽️ Amazing HD graphics and sound effects
🍽️ Real time Rush Cooking Experience
